strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<se_high>*: Greetings, <IF_SOLO>traveller<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>travellers<ENDIF_SOLO>. Would you like to rest here at our chapel?
<se_high>*: Today is a religious holiday. We usually accept a small donation for our beds, but tonight you may stay for free.
<se_high>*: As you wish. Farewell and keep safe.
<se_high>*: The facilities are rather basic, but I trust you will rest well.
<se_high>*: Good morning. May the Goddess be with you on your travels.
<se_high>*: We recommend a donation of 10 gold coins in return...
<se_high>*: Dear me, it seems you can't afford it.
<se_high>*: I'm afraid I won't be able to offer you a bed, but I pray that you will have a safe journey.
